pt_BR {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "R$",
            "BRL ",
            ",",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Portuguese locale for Brasil" }
        Source { "RAP" }
        Address { "Sankt J\u00F8rgens Alle 8, DK-1615 K\u00F8benhavn V, Danmark" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Portuguese" }
        Territory { "Brasil" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-06-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[SsyY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            "",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,#0.##;-#,#0.##",
            "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
            "#,#0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "55" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
                    "dd-MMMM-yyyy",
                    "dd-MMMM-yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Dom",
                            "Seg",
                            "Ter",
                            "Qua",
                            "Qui",
                            "Sex",
                            "S\u00E1b",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "domingo",
                            "segunda",
                            "ter\u00E7a",
                            "quarta",
                            "quinta",
                            "sexta",
                            "s\u00E1bado",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Jan",
                            "Fev",
                            "Mar",
                            "Abr",
                            "Mai",
                            "Jun",
                            "Jul",
                            "Ago",
                            "Set",
                            "Out",
                            "Nov",
                            "Dez",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "janeiro",
                            "fevereiro",
                            "mar\u00E7o",
                            "abril",
                            "maio",
                            "junho",
                            "julho",
                            "agosto",
                            "setembro",

                            "novembro",
                            "dezembro",

                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
